Comment: Tangle at [https://www.readtangle.com/](https://www.readtangle.com/) is really good. Each newsletter takes one current topic, presents viewpoints representative of each side of the aisle, and then a summary from the publisher.  1440 at  [https://join1440.com/](https://join1440.com/) covers a variety of stories from a fact-based, unbiased approach.  Finally, from a center-right, classical liberal perspective, the Morning Dispatch at [https://thedispatch.com/newsletter/morning/](https://thedispatch.com/newsletter/morning/) covers the headlines, dives deep into one story, and then has some eye-openers at the end. The Dispatch has several other weekly newletters, as well.

Comment: Heather Cox Richardson's Letters from an American on Substack [https://heathercoxrichardson.substack.com/](https://heathercoxrichardson.substack.com/) I like that she releases the written and audio versions every day as well.   Sharon McMahon's The Preamble on Substack [https://thepreamble.com/](https://thepreamble.com/) A former government teacher, Sharon does a great job balancing covering popular questions with historical perspectives.     Emily Amick's Emily In Your Phone on Substack: [https://emilyinyourphone.substack.com/](https://emilyinyourphone.substack.com/) Emily spent time on the senate counsel, so her experience in DC is more recent.

Comment: Besides what others have said... Popular Info [https://popular.info/about](https://popular.info/about) by Judd Legum has good essays and informative articles with a progressive bent... different paid tiers give different kinds access.  The Contrarian [https://contrarian.substack.com/about](https://contrarian.substack.com/about) is another good one, which has essays, interviews, articles on a wide variety of political topics and formats. has a similar paid tier / access structure.  Or for something that's a little more niche and fun... The DOGE Catcher [https://thedogecatcher.com/](https://thedogecatcher.com/) is a free daily newsletter that focuses mostly on DOGE & musk related news, with light satirical commentary but all combined with clever dog-related puns and humor, which makes the firehouse of news a bit easier to consume.   hope those help!
